QuestData.Title: Making a Harness
QuestData.Description: So you want to ride? Well, if you've made it this far someone must think you've got a shot at the Hyldsmeet.$B$BFirst things first; we'll have to make you a harness.$B$BIn the cliffs to the south, you'll find scattered groups of yeti. Their hides are tough and just the right thickness. Bring me some and we'll get you started on the path of the bear-rider.
QuestData.LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar in Brunnhildar Village wants you to obtain 3 Icemane Yeti Hides.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the hides yet? You'll find yeti in the hills below.
QuestData.RewardText: These will do nicely. I'll have the harness ready for you in no time.
